query:
UPDATE accounts
            SET account_name = ?, email_address = ?, provider_type = ?,
                imap_host = ?, imap_port = ?, imap_user = ?, imap_pass = ?, imap_use_tls = ?,
                smtp_host = ?, smtp_port = ?, smtp_user = ?, smtp_pass = ?,
                smtp_use_tls = ?, smtp_use_starttls = ?,
                is_active = ?, is_default = ?
            WHERE id = ?
